name: AWSOpsWorksAutoScalingThresholdsType
description: Describes the scaling thresholds for the AWS OpsWorks LoadBasedAutoScaling Type property. For more information, see AutoScalingThresholds in the AWS OpsWorks API Reference.

properties.name: CpuThreshold
properties.desc: The percentage of CPU utilization that triggers the starting or stopping of instances (scaling).

properties.name: IgnoreMetricsTime
properties.desc: The amount of time (in minutes) after a scaling event occurs that AWS OpsWorks should ignore metrics and not start any additional scaling events.

properties.name: InstanceCount
properties.desc: The number of instances to add or remove when the load exceeds a threshold.

properties.name: LoadThreshold
properties.desc: The degree of system load that triggers the starting or stopping of instances (scaling). For more information about how load is computed, see Load (computing).

properties.name: MemoryThreshold
properties.desc: The percentage of memory consumption that triggers the starting or stopping of instances (scaling).

properties.name: ThresholdsWaitTime
properties.desc: The amount of time, in minutes, that the load must exceed a threshold before instances are added or removed.
